detall.title: Magic Fountain - Montjuïc Fountains
detall.excerpt: The Magic Fountain of Montjuïc, or simply the Montjuïc Fountain, or Magic Fountains, is on Avinguda Maria Cristina, next to the Poble Espanyol on Montjuïc (Barcelona). It is the main feature of a set of light and water games along the axis from the Palau Nacional to Plaça d'Espanya, with waterfalls and pools and, lower down, lines of illuminated columns on either side of the avenue, today replaced by illuminated water jets of a similar size that are easier to maintain.
